name: talkSenya
commands: Which topic do you want to ask about?
When I hold it, it feels strangely heavy.|It feels like I have to constantly use light magic to lighten the book.
Do you think the power it gives is gonna be worth it?|You defintely look stronger when you use it but...|I just hope my intution is wrong on it.
I'm confident that it's gonna be the difference maker.|In order to stop Lilith...It's probably our best chance.
Thought you were gonna grab that dusty old book and take it with us.|Had me worried there for a second.
Yeah...the fact that even the legendary Orkney eventually lost to its power.|What hope do I have to wield it?
Aesc seemed the most conflicted about that choice actually.|I was watching him when you were thinking about it.
He looked like he was in deep thought.|His hands began to clench that book he always carries around. The Ivaldi?
Aesc...|I wonder what other secrets he's hiding?
Are you suspicious of him Senya?
A bit...|I don't think he's gonna betray us but.|He's not telling us everything either.|I've been dealing with lying adults my whole life.|I can sense a lie by omission.
Yeah...he had a ton of information about the founding war and the Lithrasir.|There's still so many questions to answer though.
Did you catch his little slip up before talking about Orkney?
No I must have missed it.
He said 'br-' before talking about Orkney.|I'm trying to think of what exactly he was going to say.|It feels like the answer is so obvious but...|Why can't I think of the answer?
Once we stop the ritual and get back.|Let's come back together and figure out what he's hiding.
Oh? And here I thought I was gonna have to do that myself.|You've grown up a lot {var:MC_name}

This Lilith...|How in the world is she so strong?|I thought it might have been because of the Lithrasir.|But it was still here at that lord's palace.|Yet she still dealt with teacher like he was nothing...
I wonder if it would have been easier if she did just have the Lithrasir,|things would be making more sense.|Instead she has some type of power without the Lithrasir's direct help.
I think...she must be related to the old man in some way.

Just judging by how strong Aesc is.|I think Aesc has an idea of who Lilith is.|But he's not telling us because he isn't confident either.|I'm no magic user but I've been with Schuri long enough to hear all her history lessons.|We haven't seen a prominent dark and light magic user in some time.|Yet we encounter two of them within a week.|Something is defintely wrong.
Teach...I wonder what exactly happened to him after he warped us out.
...I hope that Lilith's plan for teacher didn't come to fruition.|Teacher has a lot of explaining to do about Aesc.|I just don't know if Aesc will ever tell us the full truth or not.
Well... if he's managed to get himself to safety...|we'll make sure he tells us.
I'll hold you to that promise.
